text: I kogda ona slozhila yeye, to skazala: "Gospodi! Vot, ya slozhila yeye - zhenskogo pola". - A Allakh luchshe znal, chto ona slozhila, - ved' muzhskoy pol ne to, chto zhenskiy. - "I ya nazvala yeye Maryam, i vot - ya otdayu Tebe yeye i yeye potomstvo pod zashchitu ot satany, pobivayemogo kamnyami
